posts.title: Shakespeare’s The Jedi Doth Return
posts.content: Join your favorite Jedi on his harrowing subsequent quest to relinquish the galaxy of evil in Shakespeare’s The Jedi Doth Return. We return to the star-crossed galaxy far, far away to enjoy our beloved warriors and jesting droids soliloquize in perfect iambic pentameter.

posts.title: 3D Soccer Ball Lamp
posts.content: He shoots, and the 3D soccer ball lamp scores! – Unfortunately it’s crashed straight into the wall. The lamp’s intriguing design creates the illusion a soccer ball has been launched directly into the wall and looks great whether it is lit or not.

posts.title: Skateboard Swing Set
posts.content: Satisfy your young adrenaline junkies’s need for cheap thrills by upgrading their playground with this skateboard swing set. The swing lets them remain in a standing position – allowing them to achieve greater momentum for an exhilarating ride.

posts.title: Play-Doh Fake Poop Mold
posts.content: Throw out that fake vomit and upgrade your pranks by disgusting friends and family using this Play-Doh fake poop mold. The kit includes a turd mold, two types of brown clay, and one tub of yellow clay so you can create small pieces of corn for a more realistic look.

posts.title: Portable Espresso Machine
posts.content: Enjoy a coffee house quality roast anywhere you venture to by bringing along this portable espresso machine. It’s extremely well built and designed to be easily operated so that anyone can make professional quality caffeinated beverages without the fuss.

posts.title: The Dr. Seuss Coloring Book
posts.content: Delve into the wacky mind of Dr. Seuss by bringing his world to life with color! Each page of the Dr. Seuss coloring book features a whimsical illustration from some of Dr. Seuss’s most iconic books like “The Lorax” and “The Cat in the Hat”.

posts.title: Kink Proof Garden Hose
posts.content: Keep your hose from getting tangled by switching over to the kink proof garden hose. The innovative design features a polypropylene double helix exterior that’s extremely flexible and resistant to kinks so that you can easily bend it without losing water flow.

posts.title: Transparent Table Lamp
posts.content: Add a dash of style to any room in your home by turning on this quaint little transparent table lamp. Available in one of eight cool colors, each lamp features a completely see-through design that makes the old fashioned Edison bulb become the star of the show.

posts.title: Wine Aroma Tasting Kit
posts.content: Fine tune your wine palate from the comfort of home using this wine aroma tasting kit. This boozy and educational kit comes with small vials that are designed to help you recognize and identify the 54 aromas most commonly present in wine.

posts.title: Peeking Toilet Monster Decal
posts.content: Kids need to stop worrying about fictitious boogie mans and start worrying about real threats like toilet monsters. This easy to apply decal displays a curious monster peeking at you from inside the toilet – a hilarious joke to play on the kids and the rest of the family.

posts.title: Rainbow Caramel Popcorn
posts.content: Treat your eyes and taste buds to a snack they won’t soon forget by snacking on this rainbow caramel popcorn. This classic delicious snack stands out above the rest not only for its sweet taste but also for its vibrant colors – such as pink, yellow, and purple.

posts.title: Electric Corkscrew
posts.content: Take all the hard work out of opening corked bottles by using the electric corkscrew. With the push of a button, the corkscrew begins pulling quickly and efficiently, opening up your favorite bottles of precious fermented grape juice regardless of the type of cork.
